Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my device get the Android 4.0 update (Ice Cream Sandwich)?  So the OTA Ice Cream Sandwich deployment for Samsung Nexus S was stopped because the deployed version caused too much problems. Does somebody knows if another corrected version is another debugged version is to be deployed OTA anytime soon?
Title: Ice Cream Sandwich OTA on Nexus S?

history.Text: So the OTA Ice Cream Sandwich deployment for Samsung Nexus S was stopped because the deployed version caused too much problems. Does somebody knows if another corrected version is another debugged version is to be deployed OTA anytime soon?
